div.h2: Care Connect SDS Job Role Name

div.p: A ValueSet that identifies the job role associated with the person on the smart card. This consists of a set of Role Based Access Control (RBAC) codes. This code list is externally maintained.
Copyright Statement: Copyright Â© 2016 HL7 UK
This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

name.value: Care Connect SDS Job Role Name

description.value: A ValueSet that identifies the job role associated with the person on the smart card. This consists of a set of Role Based Access Control (RBAC) codes. This code list is externally maintained.
